title: Splash
brief_description: A home swimming pool, an accidental drowning, a distraught and helpless mother. Such tragedies can be prevented. A poolside seminar demonstrates the dangers and the means of avoiding them, emphasising the need for awareness and the knowledge of basic methods of resuscitation.
